sentence: Too bad they do not have a boardwalk or a beach and a bigger indoor pool for kids to enjoy
The rooms in Harahs older towers Marina and Harbor are old and in need of major renovation
Never book a room in the Harbor or Marina towers they are the worst
We like waterfront tower not lake view where we just stayed
Rooms are divided into harbour tower being the least expensive marina tower bayview tower and waterfront being the higher prices

We enjoy buffets but I had a slot host come out she was nice new my name ask me if you needed anything I said to her a extra buffet we where there at Tropicana had Grand funk railroad but concert was too short had to buy tickets in advance so we like your rooms and you let me stay on weekends so even though I am retired sorta of a vacation just wish I hit like last month a thousand dollars on walking dead game but it is nice at HarahsCasino even though Tropicana is buying all mew games to compete to bright there but I one day in summer when at Harah check out Cesars take that but jity you have did you own Showboat it is too crowded their but I give you a A rating but sometimes we need a extrabed small cot type but it at a clean some people left garbage in Halways and elevator my one friend grime retired also lives in Egg Harbor he meets us their stay with us got the credit card with you but we had a good stay thanks although concert was short paid 75 for 2 tickets but it is a nicecasino we will be back I moved to poconos Pennsylvania longer ride than NYC
The Chilean Sea Bass was delicious but a small serving for the price
The rooms we had three rooms in the Harbour tower were dirty with stains on the floors one looked like blood and very unpredictable air conditioning in all three rooms
My room accommodations were pleasant however the Harbour tower room is showing a bit of age and the could have been cleaner dust in some regards and the bathroom was in need of some TLC
The room in the “ Harbour ” tower was in the filthy
We were upgraded to a very nice room on the 45th floor overlooking ocean an bay
My room was nice I should of gotten a room with a ocean view
Ocean Tower great view it was like a home in a hotel
Room was fantastic with a great view of the bay and the ocean
The rooms were lovely staffing very friendly and courteous very close to a variety of attractions including beach and famous Jersey boardwalk
A walk along the bay great dining and a wonderful clean spacious room
Beautiful view of the bay
It is nice to go outside and look at the bay
Bedroom is alright with partial ocean view
The rooms on the upper floors have great views of the bay or the ocean and boardwalk
